ADMINISTRATIVE LAW JUDGE’S RULING ON CALIFORNIANS FOR GREEN NUCLEAR POWER, INC.’S SHOWING OF SIGNIFICANT FINANCIAL HARDSHIP. Californians for Green Nuclear Power has satisfied the eligibility requirements of Pub. Util. Code § 1804(a). Californians for Green Nuclear Power has shown significant financial hardship. Californians for Green Nuclear Power is preliminarily determined to be eligible for intervenor compensation in this proceeding. However, a finding of significant financial hardship in no way ensures compensation.
